text: Richard Andrew Arnold (born 24 November 1969) is an English actor and television presenter. He currently works as a freelance journalist. He is also the entertainment reporter for ITV's breakfast programme Good Morning Britain. Arnold has also appeared in several television shows. These include 71 Degrees North, Let's Dance for Comic Relief, and Strictly Come Dancing. He also has a minor role as a cult leader in Neighbours, with Denise Van Outen, in September 2019. title: Richard Arnold (presenter)
